    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Field _field)
        Method to add a Field to this Collection.
        Parameters:
        _field - Field to add to this collection

      • addFieldExpr

        protected int addFieldExpr(String _expr)
        Add a field expression to the select statement and the hash table of all field expressions. The method returns the index of the field expression. If the field expression is already added, the old index is returned, so a expression is only added once.
        Parameters:
        _expr - field expression to add
        Returns:
        index of the field expression
        See Also:
        getFieldExprIndex(java.lang.String), getAllFieldExpr(), allFieldExpr

      • getFieldExprIndex

        public int getFieldExprIndex(String _expr)
        For the parameter _expr the index in the list of all field expressions is returned.
        Parameters:
        _expr - expression for which the index is searched
        Returns:
        index of the field expression
        See Also:
        addFieldExpr(java.lang.String), getAllFieldExpr(), allFieldExpr
